ingredients.@value: Rock salt or crushed ice (see Notes)
½ tablespoon sugar dissolved in 1/2 tbsp. hot water
½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
3 dozen chilled small to medium oysters on the half-shell
1 cup fresh grapefruit juice (from 1 or 2 large grapefruit, preferably pink)

name.@value: Oysters on the Half-Shell with Grapefruit Granita

recipeInstructions.@value: 1. Combine all ingredients except rock salt and oysters, pour into a loaf pan (to a depth of about 1 in.), and freeze 1 hour.
